pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Alias matching`aliasmatching` is a python package that provides tools for identifying users that have different aliases.Tools are designed to support GitHub users ids: username, login, and e-mail.## Installation`pip install aliasmatching`## Documentationhttps://alias-matching.readthedocs.io/en/latest/overview.html## Methods`aliasmatching/mathcing` has implementation of currently available matching methods:* `bird_matching` - alias matching based on [Mining Email Social Networks](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/bird2006mes.pdf)
